attributes.title: WHAT THE HECK?!?!!!🤮🤮
attributes.review: I had downloaded this app cause I wanted to go to the next rally and all of the sudden once I opened the app it had glitch!! I was sent to Donald Trump’s photo gallery, I was completely disgusted by the fact that is had pictures of chickens and Mexican workers kissing his CHEETO BUTT!! As a loyal Trump supporter I find this really bad!! I then tried to turn my phone off but instead it cause me to send out the pictures to my dead grandmothers Facebook profile page. Her cousins fish told me that it was completely inappropriate and how I should be ashamed of myself!!! So thanks a lot Trump app! I THINK THIS APP SHOULD BE BANNED!!!!
